Sentencas: In this work, we synthesized the glasses of the SiO2-Al2O3-CaO-Na2O-MgO-K2O-B2O3-Y2O3 system and investigated their thermal properties under changes in the ratios between the components in both modifying (MgO/CaO) and glass-forming (SiO2/B2O3) oxides.
Titulo: Alumina-silica glass-ceramic sealants for tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the effects of crystallization on both the properties of sealants and their behaviour at the boundary with ceramic yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte have been studied.
Titulo: Alumina-silica glass-ceramic sealants for tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction analysis was used to determine the phase composition of the glasses both after quenching, dilatometric measurements and sealing of the glasses with the YSZ ceramic support.
Titulo: Alumina-silica glass-ceramic sealants for tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficients (CTEs) found for the glasses and glass-ceramics are shown to be in good agreement with those of other cell components.
Titulo: Alumina-silica glass-ceramic sealants for tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The sealing temperatures of these materials are found to be lower than the operating temperature limit of the interconnector alloy.
Titulo: Alumina-silica glass-ceramic sealants for tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is shown that Mg-rich glasses exhibit higher resistance to interaction with Cr compared to other compositions under study.
Titulo: Alumina-silica glass-ceramic sealants for tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The scanning electron microscopy and energy dispersive spectroscopy studies have confirmed the formation of gas-tight connections by the sealants under investigation.
Titulo: Alumina-silica glass-ceramic sealants for tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The glass demonstrating the highest stability in contact with the Crofer22APU alloy has been tested as a sealant for a tubular cell.
Titulo: Alumina-silica glass-ceramic sealants for tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This material is established to ensure a tight connection without cracks during operation at 850 degrees C for 250h.
Titulo: Alumina-silica glass-ceramic sealants for tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The materials are thus found to be promising candidates for use as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Alumina-silica glass-ceramic sealants for tubular solid oxide fuel cells
